title: How to set a custom initial value for Ids in JPA
content: In Java Persistence API (JPA), entities require unique identifiers for database records. JPA provides several strategies for generating these identifiers, such as IDENTITY, SEQUENCE, and TABLE. However, there are cases where you might need to set a custom initial value for these identifiers using the Table and Sequence strategy. In this tutorial, we will explore ...  The post appeared first on .
